nodes.text: Arumed was a small settlement that was located on the planet Nyriaan.

Arumed was a Corporate Sector Authority facility and was administered by the corporation AruMed, from which the settlement got it's name. At Arumed, the CSA focused on developing new biotechnologies from Nyriaan's resources. The facility's doctors also administered medical care to people, but were not entirely altruistic in their motives and often carried out tests on their patients, often worsening the condition that the patient was suffering from.
